data.text: @JenniferMarguli The school that invented the precursor to SARS-CoV-2 and shipped it off to Wuhan where, we are told, a brother of the virus arose independently just 400 yards away. In the alternative, the school that provided a convenient backstory for international jab fascism & cyber slavery.

@JenniferMarguli This is the same as the old "cash for clunkers" fallacy. The number of cars sold during the months of CFC increased by the same amount it decreased in the months after. Net zero change in a year.
@JenniferMarguli but it doesn't work as well as financial deprivation
